name: Programmatic SEO
description: Create SEO-driven pages at scale using templates and structured data (e.g., directory, location, comparison, and integration pages) while avoiding thin content and ensuring useful on-page structure.

goal.description: What you want to achieve with the programmatic SEO build (e.g., launch integration pages, city pages, comparison pages).

page_type.description: High-level page archetype (directory, location, integration, comparison, etc.).

template.description: Template instructions for the pages (sections, headings, data placements).

rows.description: Structured dataset rows used to generate pages. Each row corresponds to one page.

internal_linking.description: Optional internal linking strategy and hub/spoke relationships.

draft_only.description: If true, ensure all created pages are drafts (recommended).

notes.description: Any notes/warnings about thin content risk, template coverage, or required human review.
